thread.title: Jake Gyllenhaal Goes Shirtless for a Dip in the Ocean
thread.title_full: Jake Gyllenhaal Goes Shirtless for a Dip in the Ocean

author: Just Jared
title: Jake Gyllenhaal Goes Shirtless for a Dip in the Ocean
text:
It’s a good start to a new year when Jake Gyllenhaal goes shirtless at the beach.
The 36-year-old actor and his girlfriend Greta Caruso spent the day hanging out at the beach with some friends on Sunday (January 1) in St. Barts.
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Jake Gyllenhaal 
The cute couple have been in St. Barts for the past few days during the holiday season.
Up next on Jake ‘s film slate is Stronger , where he stars as a runner who lost both of his legs during the Boston marathon bombing. 
The film is set to premiere later this year.
10+ pictures inside of Jake Gyllenhaal and Greta Caruso on the beach…
